about_the_game:
Overview

Layup Legends™ is a basket-brawler for up to 4 players. Play with your friends or CPUs in 1v1 and 2v2 matches across a variety of stages. ATTACK to keep your opponents away from the ball while you THROW, DUNK, and LAYUP your way to victory. Choose from one of 9 unique SUPERS to devastate your opponents. Infuse the ball with SUPER CHARGE to unleash a powerful SUPER DUNK that can be thrown in any direction at breakneck speed!

Features

  • Play up to 4-player local matches with your friends or CPUs in VERSUS MODE. Every match will earn you coins to unlock new heads!

  • View the COLLECTION to see all the heads you own. You can unlock new heads by using coins you've earned, or by completing challenges. There are 100 heads of different rarities and styles, all unlockable by playing the game!

  • Head ONLINE to play with your friends in CUSTOM GAMES. Or challenge new opponents in MATCHMAKING. Layup Legends™ uses ROLLBACK networking for a smooth online experience!

  • Complete DAILY CHALLENGES to earn extra coins!

  • Relive your best moments with REPLAYS. Adjust the camera to find a perfect angle for a screenshot! Scrub back and forth through the replay to find just the moment you're looking for, or watch it back in slow-motion!

  • Practice every aspect of Layup Legends™ in TRAINING MODE. Whether you want to view hitboxes, see ball and knockback paths, or change your super on the fly the TRAINING MODE is filled with useful tools to help you practice your skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-9 Compatible graphics card with at least 256MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz processor or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-9 Compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The basket-brawler for up to 4 players! Use your skills to outplay your opponents on a variety of stages. Unleash powerful super moves to destroy your enemies and become a Layup Legend. Play with your friends or CPUs in 1v1 and 2v2 matches locally or online.
